item.title: Fly tipping and rubbish in flowerbeds, 2nd August
item.description:
Someone has dumped a chair, bin bags and other items next to the bridge. (There's new flytipping here about twice a week). Also, the flowerbeds next to the bridge (both sides of the road) are full of rubbish, including bottles, cans and bags. Could they please be cleaned up?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 2nd August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Green Lane, Penge, London

item.title: Single yellow lines, 2nd August
item.description:
I commented on the consultation for the Warwick way improvements. This included double yellow lines on Wilton Road near the junction to prevent weekend parking and road narrowing. Why has the road been repainted with single lines? There has been no proposed change to the existing plan made public.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wilton Road, Pimlico, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhanging hedges blocking view for cars, 2nd August
item.description:
The hedges are overhanging and makes very poor visibility when coming out of driveway. It becomes very dangerous ,especially as the cars are overspeeding on Wickham way. The hedges only been cut once this year -and that was begining of the year.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 161, Wickham Way, Park Langley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant flooding in road and pavement, 2nd August
item.description:
This section of the road is constantly flooded. It appears the kerb has now dropped (future sinkhole?!) and the pavement and pedestrian crossing is covered in ALGAE AND SLIPPERY. This is an accident waiting to happen.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Picardy Manorway, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet
